landingHeroSubtitle: Less interpretation time, more accuracy in your diagnoses
landingHeroCTAInfo: No credit card required. Ready in 2 mins. Questions? Email: info@zooesis.com
whatIsZooesisDescription1: Zooesis is an AI-powered platform that automates the interpretation of veterinary clinical studies.
whatIsZooesisStep1Description: Just upload a photo of the study...
whatIsZooesisStep3Description: ...Zooesis will generate a complete, structured clinical report ready to download or share.
benefitsItem1Description: Utilizes Gemini API for fast and accurate analysis.
benefitsItem2Description: Works with printed or digital lab photos.
benefitsItem3Description: Findings, differential diagnoses, suggested tests, questions, and conclusion.
benefitsItem4Description: Available in English, Spanish, and Portuguese.
benefitsItem5Description: Track analyses per patient with options for manual value correction.
benefitsItem6Description: Easily download and share reports in PDF format.
growingDescription1: New types of clinical analyses like biochemistry and urinalysis
growingVision: Our vision is to become the reference tool for data-driven veterinary medicine.
feature1Title: Select the analysis, upload the image and let Zooesis handle the rest
feature1Description: With Zooesis, running clinical interpretations is easier than ever. Simply select the type of analysis, upload a photo of the lab results, and let our AI instantly generate a detailed, professional report—saving you time and reducing human error.
feature2Title: Automated clinical reports ready to print or share.
feature2Description: Automatically generates complete clinical reports that are ready to print or share with just one click. Deliver clear, professional results to your clients faster—without manual formatting or editing, and with the confidence of consistent, AI-powered interpretation.
screenshotsSubtitle: Explore the intuitive interface and comprehensive reports of Zooesis.
screenshotsCallToAction: Ready to simplify your clinical workflow?
registrationSubtitle: Create your free account and start transforming your clinical interpretations.
registrationSupabase: Secure user login and data storage with Supabase.
trustDescription: Made by and for clinical veterinarians. Designed to save time, reduce errors, and improve decision-making.
homeIntro: Ready to gain insights from your veterinary lab reports? Let's get started.
homeNewAnalysisDescription: Upload a new lab report for AI interpretation.
homeHistoryDescription: Access and review your past analyses.
homeSubscriptionDescription: View or upgrade your current plan.
homeProfileDescription: Manage your account settings and details.
